explanation: Agent A is correct. When MHD_DIGEST_HAS_EXT_ERROR is defined and digest_ext_error(da) is a macro that expands to the constant expression (false), the if controlling expression becomes a compile-time invariant (always false). MISRA C 2023 Rule 14.3 forbids invariant controlling expressions (the listed exceptions do not cover a plain if with a constant false condition). If the preprocessor removes the block (MHD_DIGEST_HAS_EXT_ERROR not defined) there is no violation, but in the configuration described the code does violate Rule 14.3.
